author: Jim Whitmore
description: Tart and fruity – perhaps apt! Bittersweet notes of gentian combine well with fruity pineapple with fino sherry adding complex dryness and blue curaçao bolstering the fruitiness while also turning this cocktail turquoise blue.
name: Rollergirl
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
